se.lu.nateko.edca.svc

Class GetMap

  • java.lang.Object
      • se.lu.nateko.edca.svc.GetMap

  • public class GetMap
extends

See the GNU General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along * with EDCA. If not, see "http://www.gnu.org/licenses/". * * The latest source for this software can be accessed at * "github.org/mattiassp/edca". * * EDCA also utilizes the JTS Topology Suite, Version 1.8 by Vivid * Solutions Inc. It is released under the Lesser General Public License * ("http://www.gnu.org/licenses/") and its source can be accessed at the * JTS Topology Suite website ("http://www.vividsolutions.com/jts"). * * Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. The Android source is released * under the Apache License 2.0 * ("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0") and can be accessed at * "http://source.android.com/". * * For other enquiries, e-mail to: edca.contact@gmail.com * * A subclass of AsyncTask for making a GetMap request to a geospatial * server on a background worker thread and publishing the resulting map * image back to the UI thread. * *
    Version:
    0.43, 2013-06-25 * *
    Author:
    Mattias Spångmyr *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds mBounds
      The bounds used for this GetMap request, using the lower left and upper right corners as LatLng objects.
      private boolean mHasResponse
      Whether or not this request has received a response.
      private int mHeight
      The height of the layout to fill with the returned map image, in pixels.
      private HttpClient mHttpClient
      The HttpClient to use for sending the request.
      private Bitmap mImage
      The Bitmap image received in response to the GetMap request.
      private ServerConnection mServerConnection
      The ServerConnection that the request is being made to.
      private java.net.URI mServerURI
      The server http address and request.
      private BackboneSvc mService
      A reference to the application's background Service, received in the constructor.
      private int mWidth
      The width of the layout to fill with the returned map image, in pixels.
      static int RESULT_FAILURE
      Constant identifying that the GetMap request failed.
      static int RESULT_NOLAYERS
      Constant identifying that the GetMap request was run without layers to request.
      static int RESULT_SUCCESS
      Constant identifying that the GetMap request succeeded.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this ASyncTask.
      private static int TIME_OUT
      Constant defining the wait time before the GetMap request times out.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GetMap(BackboneSvc service, int width, int height, com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds bounds)
      Constructor that stores a reference to the BackboneSvc creating this object as well as the screen layout dimensions and the bounds for the map.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected GetMap doInBackground(ServerConnection... srvs)
      Method run in a separate worker thread when GetMap.execute() is called.
      java.lang.String fetchLayerNames()
      Method that fetches the names of the layers set to be displayed in the local SQLite database and returns them in a single String, with the names separated by commas.
      Bitmap getImage()
      Get method for the stored Bitmap response of a GetMap request.
      protected int getMapRequest()
      Method that calls a geospatial server using a GetMap request and, if successful, stores the resulting InputStream in a reusable version.
      protected void onPostExecute(GetMap result)
      Method that receives the return from doInBackground() and uses it to perform work on the UI thread.
      protected void onProgressUpdate(java.lang.Void... voids)
      Method called from within the worker thread of doInBackground() to publish the progress to the UI thread.
      void setImage(Bitmap image)
      Set method for the stored Bitmap response of a GetMap request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GetMap

        public GetMap(BackboneSvc service,
      int width,
      int height,
      com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds bounds)
        Constructor that stores a reference to the BackboneSvc creating this object as well as the screen layout dimensions and the bounds for the map.
        Parameters:
        service - The BackboneSvc whose reference to keep.
        width - The width of the layout to fill with the returned map image, in pixels.
        height - The height of the layout to fill with the returned map image, in pixels.
        bounds - The bounds used for this GetMap request, using the lower left and upper right corners as LatLng objects.

    • Method Detail

      • doInBackground

        protected GetMap doInBackground(ServerConnection... srvs)
        Method run in a separate worker thread when GetMap.execute() is called. Takes the server info from the ServerConnection supplied and stores it as a URI.
        Parameters:
        srvs - An array of ServerConnection objects from which to form the URI. May only contain 1.

      • onProgressUpdate

        protected void onProgressUpdate(java.lang.Void... voids)
        Method called from within the worker thread of doInBackground() to publish the progress to the UI thread.

      • onPostExecute

        protected void onPostExecute(GetMap result)
        Method that receives the return from doInBackground() and uses it to perform work on the UI thread.

      • getMapRequest

        protected int getMapRequest()
        Method that calls a geospatial server using a GetMap request and, if successful, stores the resulting InputStream in a reusable version.
        Returns:
        Returns true if successful, otherwise false.

      • fetchLayerNames

        public java.lang.String fetchLayerNames()
        Method that fetches the names of the layers set to be displayed in the local SQLite database and returns them in a single String, with the names separated by commas.
        Returns:
        A String with the names of the layers to be included in a GetMap request.

      • setImage

        public void setImage(Bitmap image)
        Set method for the stored Bitmap response of a GetMap request.
        Parameters:
        image - A Bitmap image.

      • getImage

        public Bitmap getImage()
        Get method for the stored Bitmap response of a GetMap request.
        Returns:
        An Bitmap image.
